Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:8#4031#skeletal caimans} and {@LinkCreature:8#4032#bonethralls} are always moving bodies around down here.

I don't know why and I don't care. Put an end to the caimans. That's an order.

I bet they were going to turn those bodies into undead slaves. In that case, both the living and the dead thank you.

Nice work.
